body_html:
1. replace all "HOST_CFG" with "host" in the entire directory

My changes are basically the same as the PR by @xpe. Have you changed anything else?

Perhaps need for a bazel clean before trying to recompile.

In the compilation log, protobuf` is also cloned and built from source here. Note I have succeeded on Darwin only---not tried yet on Linux.

Just to be sure: Do you use the exact same commits as the ones I suggested, both for Bazel and TensorFlow?

body:
> 1. replace all "HOST_CFG" with "host" in the entire directory

My changes are basically the same as the PR by @xpe. Have you changed anything else?

Perhaps need for a `bazel clean` before trying to recompile.

In the compilation log, protobuf` is also cloned and built from source here. Note I have succeeded on Darwin only---not tried yet on Linux.

Just to be sure: Do you use the exact same commits as the ones I suggested, both for Bazel and TensorFlow?
